If I lived in Barcelona,  I'd live in the El Born area.  And Bormuth would be my local bar. Located on a sloping corner,  Bormuth occupies 2 floors,  and has an outside terrace. We went here a few times - it was always really busy,  mainly with locals rather than tourists. The staff were extremely friendly and were able to recommend some great local beers to try out. We didn't eat here - but when we visit again,  we definitely will - the food looked and smelled amazing! It puts me in mind of a Spanish version of Brutti Ma Buoni,  back home in Glasgow.
